About¶

PreciSo is a software written in C++ and developped by Michel Perez and his co-workers. It does classical nucleation and growth theories calculations for precipitation in metallurgical systems.

Getting Started¶

  • Source code : Gitlab Repository

  • To install PreciSo, check out the getting started page.

  • To try PreciSo with no installation, go here :

Authors¶

  • Michel Perez - MichelPerezNet

  • Thibaut Chaise

  • Arnaud Allera (Python API)

  • And many others !

Contribution and support¶

Contributions and feedback are welcome. The issue tracker is a great tool to submit questions, support requests and report bugs.

To cite this project¶

Perez (M.), Dumont (M.) et Acevedo-Reyes (D.), Implementation of the classical nucleation theory for precipitation, Acta Mater., vol. 56, 2008, p. 2119–2132 (PDF)

License¶

This project is licensed under the CECILL licence - see the LICENSE.md file for details
